website_summaries.verdict: Sleek design and HD call quality. An affordable flip phone with an impressive battery life.
pros: With a battery life of 16 days in standby, this you won't need to charge this flip phone often
Large, easy-to-see keys and loud ring volume
cons: Not all customers received unlocked models

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this unlocked phone specifically for his trip to Australia. According to the tech support people, it was going to work fine, based on the behavior of the phone in the US - before he left. He gets to Australia today, OUTSITE THE RETURN WINDOW - and it doesn't work at all. He takes it in to a shop there - the sim card works in other phones, so it's not the sim card. They couldn't get the phone to work and he had to buy a new one. ARGHHHHH
customer_reviews.author: Anna N

customer_reviews.title: Your item might die a month later
customer_reviews.text: Probably the last time I would order from this merchant because my mom only had the phone for maybe a month an now it won't even charge or turn on. Try selling better products
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G Paulino

customer_reviews.title: FAKE LISTING DO *NOT* BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product is marketed as an Alcatel manufacturer phone that is able to be used on any network (GSM unlocked). For one, the product doesn't even match the images or firmware, as it is an ATT phone that has been unlocked by ATT. There is no Alcatel print - Just the ATT logo. The phone itself isn't a bad phone. But because of the ATT hiccup, there are a multitude of errors that can happen, such as not being able to receive texts - This has been documented on plenty of other sites, and I found this to be true as well. I am returning and reporting this immediately. Do NOT buy this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Works with Ultra Mobile
customer_reviews.text: This is the only flip phone that I've found that works with the Ultra Mobile network and I've tried several. They have a great plan but will only work with a 4G LTE phone. This is a simple phone that's good for seniors. It's light and have big buttons. I'm getting another one for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley S.

customer_reviews.title: Not fully compatible with t-mobile
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Alcatel unlocked phone under the assumption that it would work on any GSM network with appropriate configuration or I am not sure what unlocked means. With a t-mobile SIM and despite a few hours on the phone and in store with representatives trying to configure the phone I was not able to send SMS messages with this phone. Calls and incoming texts were OK. I don't know what the deep reason is but representatives for t-mobile noticed that it was an ATT phone and was not supported on their network -- they worked on it "best effort". Due to very brief use, I can not comment on other properties of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Endgaristel

customer_reviews.title: NOT UNLOCKED
customer_reviews.text: NOT UNLOCKED! Took phone directly to AT&T to have activated to my account. Once powered up it asked for unlock code to leave Cricket Wireless
customer_reviews.author: James R Mulligan

customer_reviews.title: Great 4G Flip Phone for Elderly
customer_reviews.text: My dad is almost 90 and he lives alone in NYC. His landlord kept cutting the phone line in an attempt to force him to move after over 50 years. I moved Dad's telephone number to this cell phone 2 years ago and it has been great! I had to purchase a replacement this week, but the cost is do reasonable I don't mind. Dad doesn't have wi-Fi, so 4G coverage is important to me. The seller is responsive and delivery is quick.
customer_reviews.author: Kim F.

customer_reviews.title: Would not turn on although 100 percent charged
customer_reviews.text: I used the phone once when I set it up. The second time in an emergency situation, it would not turn on, although 100 percent charged. It took me several minutes to pry open the case to remove the sim card and re-insert to jump start it and it still did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you have any hearing loss.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who only wanted a flip phone. He has a hard time hearing on a phone and seeing the numbers and screen. This phone was the worst possible. He couldn't hear the ringer or callers, even on the highest setting. The screen was impossible for him to see. We returned the phone for a refund. Not recommended for older individuals.
customer_reviews.author: RC6374

customer_reviews.title: Back to the drawing board
customer_reviews.text: Screen is very hard to see. Increasing text size made it even harder to read because now only 2 or 3 words would fit on the screen. The buttons were very hard to push and impossible to see at night. Very dissatisfied. Phone returned.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Husband

customer_reviews.title: slow
customer_reviews.text: phone is a little slow.. takes a 1/2 sec from when you press a button for it to react...
customer_reviews.author: devorah k.

customer_reviews.title: Does support 4g or LTE
customer_reviews.text: Doesnot support LTE or 4G, after 3 month of struggle where all the calls going to voice mail was due to the phone compatibility issue with 4g/LTE issue as changed the network twice to check whether its a network issue or phone's. I dont know what amazon will do to fix it apart from giving me refund.
customer_reviews.author: Prachi

customer_reviews.title: poor micrpphone
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this phone, but the microphone was a big zero. People complained that they couldn't hear me. To test it I called my old phone and left a voice mail, my voice sounded weak and distant. Has anyone else experienced this? (model #4044c)
customer_reviews.author: Richard N.

customer_reviews.title: Not for seniors & gen Xers.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my (59 year old) aunt and she could not figure it out. Shes got 10 years on me and I had problems! I tried to change my password, but could not read the text message while on a call. Impossible! It's too complicated for me! It is not a simple phone, big buttons, yeah I guess. It has too much going on!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for elderly folks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my mom's now obsolete 3G phone that can no longer make calls in my area. It has big buttons and an option for large text display to make it easier for my mom to see what she's doing. It's relatively simple to use. It even has an internet browser! You control the cursor with the arrow buttons. The phone is big enough that it feels comfortable in your hand and it's not slippery. I bought mine from energy electronics and it was definitely unlocked. I just swapped the sim card from the old phone and it worked right away. Overall I am very happy with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware: Doubtful about unlocked
customer_reviews.text: From the package, there are some questions: 1. There is a label saying it is a new Alcatel GSM unlocked phone. (see the picture) 2. The package shows this phone is with “Cricket Wireless” (see the picture) 3. The package shows “This Box Contains:home & Battery, USB Charger, SIM Card” (see the picture) 4. There is NO SIM Card (different from the package information) 5. There are some fine prints, saying that “This phone may only be used with Cricket service for the first six months after activation. ....” THESE FINE PRINTS ARE NOT WRITTEN ON THE DESCRIPTION IN AMAZON LISTING. I am trying to contact the customer service, but I can only leave a voice message.
customer_reviews.author: Wai Chow

customer_reviews.title: This Phone Is a Factory Return Item does not include an owners Manual
customer_reviews.text: This Phone Was a Return item to "cricket" and was a malfunctioning item, it only works about half the time and is slow responding for a 4G. It is totally Problematic at Best. We are not Pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Jbuck406

customer_reviews.title: Says NEW but it was USED and DEACTIVATED
customer_reviews.text: They said it was a new phone and it WAS NOT! It had been deactivated and needed a new SIM card.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Crider

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The phone is ok for what I got it for, but the phone charger was not the original and although I get its previously used the price I paid was more then what I should have. This phone is worth $25 not $44. The charger did not work at all. And I had to purchase another. The good of it is the phone is in good condition with no worn marks and the quality is good. So total 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Enid C

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy - not unlocked
customer_reviews.text: Despite the phone saying clearly in the description that it is unlocked, it is not. I'm now in Germany - which the GSM band frequency supports - trying to use a prepaid local sim, but I cannot use it. The phone continually requests an NCK code, or "Network Unlock Key". It's locked to the provider, but here's the real kicker - if you try to unlock it on att.com, it will claim it knows nothing about the device, and therefore cannot unlock it. So then you're SOL, with a decent looking brick on your desk.
customer_reviews.author: Evan B.

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Misleading description of phone. The phone is locked, does not have sim card and their help people tell you to call amazon. Found out the hard way because i had to spend over an hour in my regular carrier's store to correct their mistakes. Outside of box says sim card included but their people says no it does not come with a sim card. If i can give a zero rating i would.
customer_reviews.author: Baliliah

customer_reviews.title: Decent phone...good value.
customer_reviews.text: Basic flip phone with some usual complaints like shorter battery life, several steps to delete phone log, and such. But if you want a basic flip phone for calls, it's decent and a good value for the money. Better than his last one and battery life isn't an issue since it gets charged every day regardless.
customer_reviews.author: pateacher

customer_reviews.title: Locked AT&T Phone with Terms and Conditions for Unlocking
customer_reviews.text: In the box was a LOCKED AT&T phone instead of the UNLOCKED Alcatel branded phone as pictured. I ordered two of them to be sure, and both were the same LOCKED AT&T PREPAID phone. Third-party unlocking services weren't able to unlock the phone right away, so I'm sending both back. To unlock, you must activate with AT&T and maintain an active account for 6 months. There will also be an irremovable myAT&T icon on the home screen. This is not the UNLOCKED Alcatel phone as advertised. It is a LOCKED AT&T prepaid phone with strings attached for unlocking.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Work with T-Mobile chip
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for my father inlaw he's in his 70's so i need to get a phone he could understand and manage and easy-to-use i bring it to T-Mobile they say it a cricket phone so i must bring it to the cricket store i came home put tape over the cricket logo and bring it back to the T-Mobile store 😀and they put his chip in and it work now he loves his phone and the battery does not run down he hear very clearly and it is loud good phone for the elderly thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Simma22

customer_reviews.title: Good quality phone.
customer_reviews.text: Love the large buttons. Only thing I don't like about the phone is not being able to block numbers. Fast shipping received before delivery date.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Plemons

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival- DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I figured this phone was a good bargain/cheap flip phone for my mum who isn't very good with tech. It might have done the trick if the phone had worked for more than a minute or two. After so little time, it would white-scree-of-death and I would have to reboot it. Multiple reboots and recharging did not resolve the issue. Buy a different phone.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolas Joseph Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Alca...Crap
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad. Less than a week old the power chord fell apart. It's difficult to maneuver and is a piece of crap.The volume can jardly be heard on incoming calls
customer_reviews.author: breezy bee

customer_reviews.title: 2nd phone
customer_reviews.text: My carrier is T-Mobile so I subscribe to digits where you can have one number across multiple devices. I wanted this very basic phone so I can still have a phone while at the beach without worrying if I go for a swim someone will steal my smart phone. This phone is more than enough and very good. So this was a great purchased. It has more than enough features and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Lotz

customer_reviews.title: In call volume is very low even when at its highest.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good phone for seniors as it's easy to use. I have a also love the big buttons. HOWEVER the in call volume is very poor. Even at its highest you can hardly hear the person on the other line.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: It is good.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I wanted. It is 4G for T-Mobile and has good connection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mom!
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace the cell phone my mother broke and was afraid I would not be successful as 4G flip phones (T-Mobile) are being fazed out. This phone is almost identical to the one my mother broke and that is perfect because my mother has dementia! Highly recommend and EXTREMELY easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Falsely advertised
customer_reviews.text: Falsely advertised. I purchased this phone based on a review that it was TMobile compatable, it's not! I had to pay to return a falsely advertised phone which was less my refund. Very disappointed 😡
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size battery
customer_reviews.text: Bought it and the battery does not fit. It's too big! How are you going to send off a phone with the battery being to big. They simply do not care just want the money. Not happy. Still on hold to get sent the right one. Update: Got a full refund and amazon let me keep the phone and bought the correct battery. Pretty cool that amazon did that
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T RING & DOESN'T WORK WELL!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a "new" phone but since some buttons don't work and the phone just doesn't ring, I'm certain this is a refurbished phone I got instead of a new phone. Didn't take long for it to break! Disgusted with it...buy at your own risk! '
customer_reviews.author: TreeBee

customer_reviews.title: Would reccomend or kiddos and the elderly
customer_reviews.text: All and all this had been a great purchase. We bought it so it could be used on a local network where we live. It works on the net work here, the battery life is decent goes a full days before needing a charge (used by a 10 year old, so it's used frequently). Thw volume is nice and loud and it came in new packaging. I also work for our local phone company and reccomend this device to our elderly customers for the large buttons and easy use.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't matter what the listing says, this phone is NOT UNLOCKED!
customer_reviews.author: Jackson K.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Mom had a smartphone for about a year and hated every day with it. I ordered her this phone, changed the Sim Card, and she was good to go. She loves it! Nice large buttons and easy to see screen.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for T-mobile, even though it comes up as Sprint
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace this exact phone as when I flipped mine open the screen separated from the base and severed it's ribbon Pros Battery lasts about 7 to 10 days before needing to be charged. Cons Small Screen was broken, but didn't care to much as big screen was not and I could see who's calling me on it Can't add new contacts even though i did it the same way as my old phone Calling Voice mail I have to enter my password, when I didn't on my old phone, It maybe because of it being formatted as a sprint phone and I have a T-Mobile account.
customer_reviews.author: John Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Good for technology challenged elderly people
customer_reviews.text: My mother in law loves it. She never did figure out the droid so she's back to making and receiving calls. She doesn't text outbound so no worries. Feed back from her has been favorable.
customer_reviews.author: Vince L.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for blind and/or deaf with creative features.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this model for my blind uncle living in a nursing home. The features were great for his needs! An abundance of features to be utilized by a blind person though activating and inputing data and downloads was time consuming. It's worth it! Voiceover reads all menu and action options in a clear loud voice. There is both radio and mp3 player plus web that can be preset to listening sites for easy push button access. Great phone for our purposes! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy money
customer_reviews.text: Like large easy to see and little irritating calling cricket but works great!
customer_reviews.author: Laressa Grundy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The phone says to call ultra mobile not unlocked returned
customer_reviews.author: Magenta

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for older person
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my mom. Good phone for older person who doesn't use smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Jenke

customer_reviews.title: Good unlocked flip phone.
customer_reviews.text: Bought from Energy Electronics and worked with Mint Mobile (T-Mobile MVNO) out of the box. LTE seems to be working and sound quality is great. Other features are mediocre and what you'd expect from a flip phone.
customer_reviews.author: Zampona

customer_reviews.title: Not Unlocked
customer_reviews.text: Phone arrived new in box with no paper or anything stating what the unlock code would be. Sure enough once I put the tmobile sim in it asked for the unlock code which hadn't been put in by the seller. No I have to return it and buy something else. Sigh*
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Morgan Kay

customer_reviews.title: Do not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Product is NOT unlocked (what was shipped was an ATT prepaid phone, new in box) Worked with ATT through their web site and they stated 'No Unlock Code' However, I was promised a full refund upon return - haven't gotten it yet though beginning to wonder
customer_reviews.author: Lois Anne Bober

customer_reviews.title: This model (4044c) DOES NOT do wifi calling
customer_reviews.text: Works with t-mobile so far. Seems solid enough. Bluetooth works well. The trap I fell into was thinking it could do wifi calling, but this specific model of the alcatel (4044c) DOES NOT have a wifi calling option in the phone settings. Find another if you need that.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse

customer_reviews.title: It's not a smart phone. Talk and text.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use basic phone. E-mail hard to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Some parts were missing
customer_reviews.text: In the box was only wire and was wrong one
customer_reviews.author: N&M

customer_reviews.title: Wrong information
customer_reviews.text: Phone was advertised as unlock but was not so it was locked
customer_reviews.author: steve scott

customer_reviews.title: Battery life horrible
customer_reviews.text: We have had this phone for less than 2 months and wont hold a charge. Not very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda V

customer_reviews.title: Texting is very rough
customer_reviews.text: The T9 texting here does not capitalize and often inserts unwanted numbers into messages.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Pillis

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The volume button didn’t work and it was a struggle to get the back cover off
customer_reviews.author: BEANCOUNTER

customer_reviews.title: Not what it seemed
customer_reviews.text: This was an AT&T branded phone, and I ended up being unable to use it with Tracfone. So I went to an AT&T store, got it working with them. But today it bricked on me and cannot be revived.
customer_reviews.author: David Latané

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Sound
customer_reviews.text: I cannot hear anything without turning on the speaker. If I knew it before, will never order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is not an unlocked phone
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised as unlocked. I took it to the Tmobile store and was told it is a locked phone. It requires a "network unlock code" when turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Battery is dead after one month. Money wasted. Ringer choices suck. Phone sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Shane townsend

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking phone!
customer_reviews.text: This phone was not compatible with AT & T Mobility; therefore, I cannot use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Seems good.
customer_reviews.text: I never really used it, my 5 year old ordered it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Arnie

customer_reviews.title: not a good phone if you want simple
customer_reviews.text: this phone is hard to operate, to many steps to do, not a simple phone, should have stuck with lg, does'nt work the same as other phones, comes with no manual, call center useless
customer_reviews.author: dragonlord

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: it was a gift for my uncle. he is 80 years old. A litte too quiet a ball and a litte complicated. this is his first phone so i think he needs time :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unlocked GSM flip phone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this GSM flip phone from Energy Electronics and the phone was unlocked and in excellent condition. The phone takes a nano size SIM card and the nano SIM cards of any GSM carrier will work on it.
customer_reviews.author: The Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Product Defective
customer_reviews.text: After carefully opening the package, inserting the battery correctly and charging, the unit would not turn on after holding the on button for an extended time. Note: The "round" seal tape on the box had two (2) layers which suggests that this item had been returned to this supplier before.
customer_reviews.author: Ray in Boston South Shore

customer_reviews.title: WORKED GREAT WITH att fAMILY pLAN
customer_reviews.text: I was ecstatic to find that this plip phone works great with my existing AT&T Family Plan. My mom loves it!
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: IT'S NOT "UNLOCKED"
customer_reviews.text: The flip phone is not unlocked, can only work with a cricket carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Audio is a pain!!!
customer_reviews.text: The phone is what I expected, however, nothing was stated about the constant audio on the phone. Does not state how to turn the audio off. It connected with our network just fine. Other than having to listen to the audio, we are very pleased with the phone. If anyone knows how to turn the audio off - please let us know....
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Brant-Downer

customer_reviews.title: Super battery!
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement phone and not only was it cheap the battery life is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Melsa

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Consumer Cellular
customer_reviews.text: Nothing was mentioned in the details that this phone would not work on a Consumer Cellular program. Otherwise I would not have purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone for my husband. His 20 yr old LG flip phone finally died. Although this phone has many features he wanted (1) a flip phone, (2) a phone to make a call and get a call and (3) a loud ringer. This phone fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality..
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a simple phone to use. Impressed with the quality considering the cost. Nice large numbers too.
customer_reviews.author: AmazoPau L

customer_reviews.title: Phones ok for the elderly
customer_reviews.text: Battery sucks/with 4g only get old youtube video maybe can read the Google news
customer_reviews.author: Michael love

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cheap Phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for my grandfather to use. Packaging and phone were nice and it worked immediately with his SIM card (PureTalk USA).
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible piece of crap. Stopped working after 30 days. Will not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Locked and stolen
customer_reviews.text: Phones not only locked but also reported as a stolen phone will never buy from this person or company again
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Lasts 6 weeks and dies
customer_reviews.text: Phone lasted about a month and a half, then died.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Hills

customer_reviews.title: Not unlocked
customer_reviews.text: Not unlocked. I cant use this phone. And wrote fornsupport to seller and nothing was responded back.
customer_reviews.author: Cristin

customer_reviews.title: Accessible problem
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone send it to Jamaica and could not access the credit balance as with other phone it can only make a call and receive one you have to take out the sim out place it in another phone add the credit then replace in this one I am very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: norma mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Not working with any sprint network
customer_reviews.text: I Have returned it cause its not working with sprint even its unlocked
customer_reviews.author: Name

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Wanted the most simple big button unlocked phone for a senior, and this was perfect. Came with battery and house charger. Haven't had much luck with these batteries in the past, but maybe this one will last longer. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Good phone but worthless battery
customer_reviews.text: The phone is fine. But the battery that came with the phone was three years old and did not work. We had to use a battery from another phone we had previously bought in order for the phone to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing basic phone
customer_reviews.text: Works great, includes calling, texting, pictures, email, web... amazing battery life, rarely have to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Avruch

customer_reviews.title: As good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This phone is for an elderly person. It is easy to use. Key size and screen are very good. Battery life is above average. A very good option for someone not needing a smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for talk and text
customer_reviews.text: If you're using the phone for just talk and text it's amazing However if you're using it for music or pictures or anything else the phone offers it's a nightmare Just to sum up it's a great phone if you are using it just to talk and text
customer_reviews.author: Sam samules

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Got this phone a few days ago , It is unlocked and new in the box , All seems good
customer_reviews.author: Donna A. Albury

customer_reviews.title: Complicated phone
customer_reviews.text: Not good functioning buttons very bad overall vary bad. I'm using cell phones for 10+ years and this is a bad pieces, I dont have time to write a long description but its bad.
customer_reviews.author: Moshe zich mech

customer_reviews.title: easy set-up
customer_reviews.text: better than expected. Easy to use, clear voice. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: W Jean Stringfellow

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery
customer_reviews.text: The battery is horrible. After charging overnight the battery dies quickly. The phone isn't used for browsing, playing games, or anything else that drains a battery. After making just a couple short phone calls the battery has less than 50% life left.
customer_reviews.author: LauraMM

customer_reviews.title: This phone is NOT unlocked
customer_reviews.text: This phone is from a tracfone company called CRICKET and is not unlocked. Very misleading. Sending back!
customer_reviews.author: Peter J Stone

customer_reviews.title: Good reception
customer_reviews.text: Gets good reception in poor signal areas. Simple flip phone, works on Mint mobile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Using t-mobile service with this phone👍
customer_reviews.text: Phone is great so far, using it for about one week. Was worried it wouldn't work for me, but it was fantastic. I took my sim card out of my smartphone and transferred to this phone and went without a hitch.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Not work on T-Mobile
customer_reviews.text: Supposedly unlocked, but I took it to a T-Mobile store, and no SIM card would work.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Phone is locked
customer_reviews.text: Entered in my T-Mobile Sim and phone is still locked. It’s asking for a NCK code
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: My husband’s first cell phone!
customer_reviews.text: The directions leave a lot to be desired but the company was gracious in helping.
customer_reviews.author: mamcameron

customer_reviews.title: SIM CARD
customer_reviews.text: THERE WAS (NO) SIM CARD WITH MY FLIP PHONE LIKE THE INSTRUCTIONS SAID THERE WOULD BE.

customer_reviews.title: no good condition

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This was a very cheaply made phone. I do not reccomend it to anyone unless you are looking for a disposable phone. It broke in less than 3 months.

customer_reviews.title: Great 4G Flip Phone
customer_reviews.text: Have only been using this phone for a week, but so far it does exactly what I need and is easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Missing SIM card
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the phone I expected. However, I took it to a Cricket store for assistance in activating it to replace a lost phone and when they opened the package the SIM card was missing so I had to purchase one for $10 plus taxes.

product_meta.title: Alcatel QUICKFLIP 4044C | 4G LTE | HD Voice FlipPhone | - GSM Unlocked
product_meta.description: Requires a nano size SIM card (Not included) Memory 512MB RAM, up to 1000MB ROM MicroSD Slot supports up to max 32G, Processor QCOMM MSM8909 Quad-core Wi-Fi 802.11a/b/g/n (2.4GHz) Camera 2MP, Talk time 2G:6H; 3G:8H; 4G: 6.8H, Standby time 330H, Dimensions 4.13" x 2.08" x 0.74", Weight 4.16 oz, Battery 1350mAh removable, HAC Rated for hearing aids: M4/T4, Audio jack 3.5 mm, includes a large keypad and display to easily navigate the icon-based menu. Surf the web using a fast 4G LTE or Wi-Fi connection and enjoy crystal clear calls with HD Voice 2.8" QVGA internal & 1.44" external color displaysLong-Lasting 1350 mAh battery, 2MP camera, with video recording Easy to use flip design & large keypad with 4G LTE & Wi-Fi
feature_bullets: Will a GSM phone work for me: GSM unlocked phones will work on Supported Networks with a NANO SIM Cards (Sim NOT included in purchase) you will need to contact your Service Provider for set up and to get a Sim card

Will this work for me: (GSM): 850, 900, 1800, 1900, 2100, 4G LTE: 1, 2, 4, 5, 7, 12, (MFBI) contact Service provider to verify they support these GSM frequencies in the area you intend on using the device

How long will it last me: The battery capacity is 1350 mAh (a Removable TLi013C1) which can last 8 solid hours of streaming at 4G LTE speeds as well a Standby time of up to 16 days (according to the manufacturer)
Phone's Best Feature: Simply Put the HD Voice capability its Crystal clear calls and reduced background noise. Sleek flip design protects the screen and conserves battery
What does GSM Mean: Service providers that Use SIM Cards for Service like AT&T and T-Mobile as well others that support the Bands listed in Bullet point #2 It will not work On Verizon Or Sprint
